verses.verse: If <S%G1487><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Ye Were Raised With <S%G4891><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> The Things <S%G3588><s%> Above <S%G507><s%> Seek, <S%G2212><s%> Where <S%G3757><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> At The <S%G1722><s%> Right Hand <S%G1188><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Sitting : <S%G2521><s%>
The Things <S%G3588><s%> Above <S%G507><s%> Mind, <S%G5426><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> The Things <S%G3588><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth; <S%G1093><s%>

When <S%G3752><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> May Be Manifested <S%G5319><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Life, <S%G2222><s%> Our <S%G2257><s%> Then <S%G5119><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Shall Be Manifested <S%G5319><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Glory. <S%G1391><s%>

Put To Death <S%G3499><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Members <S%G3196><s%> Your <S%G5216><s%> Which Are <S%G3588><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth, <S%G1093><s%> Fornication, <S%G4202><s%> Uncleanness, <S%G167><s%> Passion, <S%G3806><s%> Desire <S%G1939><s%> Evil, <S%G2556><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Covetousness, <S%G4124><s%> Which <S%G3748><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%>, Idolatry. <S%G1495><s%>

' On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> Which Things <S%G3739><s%> Comes <S%G2064><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wrath <S%G3709><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sons <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Disobedience. <S%G543><s%>

Among <S%G1722><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> Walked <S%G4043><s%> Once <S%G4218><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> Ye Were Living <S%G2198><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> These Things. <S%G846><s%>

But <S%G3570><s%> Now, <S%G1161><s%> Put Off <S%G659><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Ye, <S%G5210><s%> All <S%G3588><s%> These Things, <S%G3956><s%> Wrath, <S%G3709><s%> Indignation, <S%G2372><s%> Malice, <S%G2549><s%> Blasphemy, <S%G988><s%> Foul Language <S%G148><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Mouth <S%G4750><s%> Your. <S%G5216><s%>

Do <S%G3361><s%> Not Lie <S%G5574><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> One Another, <S%G240><s%> Having Put Off <S%G554><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Old <S%G3820><s%> Man <S%G444><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Deeds, <S%G4234><s%> His <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Put On <S%G1746><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> New <S%G3501><s%> That Is <S%G3588><s%> Being Renewed <S%G341><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Knowledge <S%G1922><s%> ' According To <S%G2596><s%> The Image <S%G1504><s%> Of Him Who <S%G3588><s%> Created <S%G2936><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%>

Where <S%G3699><s%> There <S%G3756><s%> Is Not <S%G1762><s%> Greek <S%G1672><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Jew, <S%G2453><s%> Circumcision <S%G4061><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Uncircumcision, <S%G203><s%> Barbarian, <S%G915><s%> Scythian, <S%G4658><s%> Bondmen, <S%G1401><s%> Free; <S%G1658><s%> But <S%G235><s%> All <S%G3588><s%> Things <S%G3956><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Is Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

Put On <S%G1746><s%> Therefore, <S%G3767><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Elect <S%G1588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Beloved, <S%G25><s%> Bowels <S%G4698><s%>, Of Compassions, <S%G3628><s%> Kindness, <S%G5544><s%> Humility, <S%G5012><s%>, Meekness, <S%G4236><s%> Longsuffering; <S%G3115><s%>

Bearing With <S%G430><s%> One Another, <S%G240><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5483><s%> Each Other, <S%G1438><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> Any <S%G5100><s%> Against <S%G4314><s%> Any <S%G5100><s%> Should Have <S%G2192><s%> A Complaint; <S%G3437><s%> Even As <S%G2531><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Forgave <S%G5483><s%> You, <S%G5213><s%> So <S%G3779><s%> Also Do <S%G2532><s%> Ye. <S%G5210><s%>

And <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3956><s%> To All <S%G1161><s%> These Add <S%G5125><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Love, <S%G26><s%> Which <S%G3748><s%> Is The <S%G2076><s%> Bond <S%G4886><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Perfectness. <S%G5047><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Peace <S%G1515><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Let Preside <S%G1018><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Hearts, <S%G2588><s%> Your <S%G5216><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Ye Were Called <S%G2564><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Body, <S%G4983><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Thankful <S%G2170><s%> Be. <S%G1096><s%>

Thy <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Let Dwell <S%G1774><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> Richly, <S%G4146><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Wisdom; <S%G4678><s%> Teaching <S%G1321><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Admonishing <S%G3560><s%> Each Other <S%G1438><s%> In Psalms <S%G5568><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Hymns <S%G5215><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Songs <S%G5603><s%> Spiritual <S%G4152><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> Singing <S%G103><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Heart <S%G2588><s%> Your <S%G5216><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> The Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Everything, <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G5100><s%> Whatsoever <S%G302><s%> Ye May Do <S%G4160><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Work, Do <S%G2041><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Name <S%G3686><s%> Of The Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Giving Thanks <S%G2168><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The Father <S%G3962><s%> ' By <S%G1223><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> Wives, <S%G1135><s%> Subject Yourselves <S%G5293><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> Your Own <S%G2398><s%> Husbands, <S%G435><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Is Becoming <S%G433><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The Lord. <S%G2962><s%>
<S%G3588><s%> Husbands, <S%G435><s%> Love <S%G25><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wives, <S%G1135><s%> <S%G2532><s%> And <S%G3361><s%> Be Not Bitter <S%G4087><s%> Against <S%G4314><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> Children, <S%G5043><s%> Obey <S%G5219><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Parents <S%G1118><s%> In <S%G2596><s%> All Things; <S%G3956><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Well Pleasing <S%G2101><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> Fathers, <S%G3962><s%> Do <S%G3361><s%> Not Provoke <S%G2042><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Children, <S%G5043><s%> Your <S%G5216><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> They Be Disheartened. <S%G120><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> Bondmen, <S%G1401><s%> Obey <S%G5219><s%> In All <S%G2596><s%> Things <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> Flesh <S%G4561><s%> Masters, <S%G2962><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> Eye Services, <S%G3787><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Men Pleasers, <S%G441><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Simplicity <S%G572><s%> Of Heart, <S%G2588><s%> Fearing <S%G5399><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

Knowing <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> From The <S%G575><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Ye Shall Receive <S%G618><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Recompense <S%G469><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Inheritance, <S%G2817><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Ye Serve. <S%G1398><s%>

But <S%G3588><s%> He That <S%G1161><s%> Does Wrong <S%G91><s%> Shall Receive For <S%G2865><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> He Did Wrong, <S%G91><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> There <S%G3756><s%> Is No <S%G2076><s%> Respect Of Persons. <S%G4382><s%>
